<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4369</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Great Grandpa</string>
            <string language="es">Mi estupendo abuelo</string>
            <string language="ga">My Great Grandpa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Großer Großvater</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon Grand Grand-papa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu Grandpa Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Mio Grandpa Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μεγάλο Grandpa μου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The relationship between the very young and the very old is one which many children will have first-hand experience of. They can empathise with the little girl in this story and through activities children can explore the important historical concepts of generation and sequence.</string>
            <string language="es">La relación entre los más jóvenes y los más mayores es una relación de la que muchos niños tienen conocimiento de primera mano. Pueden enfatizar con la niña pequeña de este cuento y mediante las actividades, los niños pueden explorar los conceptos históri</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh taithí pearsanta ag go leor leanaí ar an gcaidreamh idir duine an-sean agus duine an-óg. Is féidir leo bheith comhbhách ;eis an gcailín beag sa scéal seo agus is féidir leo coincheapanna tábhachtacha stairiúla de ghlúine agus seicheamh a fhiosrú trí</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verhältnis zwischen dem sehr jungen und dem 
sehr alten ist eins, deren viele Kinder aus erster Hand bezogene 
Erfahrung haben. Sie Dose empathise mit dem kleinen Mädchen in 
dieser Geschichte und durch Aktivitäten Kinder können die wichtigen 
historischen Konzepte des Erzeugung und der Reihenfolge erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le rapport entre très le jeune et très le vieux 
est un dont beaucoup d'enfants auront une expérience de première 
main. Ils empathise de bidon avec la petite fille dans cette 
histoire et par des enfants d'activités peuvent explorer les concepts
historiques importants de la génération et de l'ordre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O relacionamento entre o muito novo e o muito 
velho é um de que muitas crianças terão a experiência first-hand. 
Empathise da lata com a menina pequena nesta história e 
através das crianças das atividades podem explorar os conceitos 
históricos importantes da geração e da seqüência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rapporto fra molto il giovane e molto il 
vecchio è uno in cui molti bambini avranno esperienza di prima mano. 
Empathise della latta con la ragazza piccola in questa storia ed
attraverso i bambini di attività possono esplorare i concetti storici
importanti della generazione e della sequenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σχέση μεταξύ πολύ του νέου και πολύ του παλαιού 
είναι μια της οποίας πολλά παιδιά θα έχουν την από πρώτο χέρι 
εμπειρία. Μπορούν με το μικρό κορίτσι σε αυτήν την ιστορία
και μέσω των δραστηριοτήτων τα παιδιά μπορούν να ερευνήσουν τις 
σημαντικές ιστορικές έννοιες της παραγωγής και της ακολουθίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
